name: Dark de.wikipedia.org
description: A dark theme for the de.wikipedia.org websites.
additional_info:
Please note that this is a very "quick" approach to styling most of the content. Unfortunately, many templates, tables, and specialized widgets define their own color as inline-style. It works quite well though.

This style was limited to the German Wikipedia project, because other languages may use even more direct formatting (e. g. English frontpage).
